name: Space Hole 2018
description: You Gotta Go in the Space Hole! Adventure through space, go into space holes! Roll, fly, explore, and dive into Space Holes! Get Space Gems and expand your network of holes!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any multi-core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
